subject: Official Notice: Fiduciary Duty Compliance for Sarah Mitchell
body:
Dear Sarah Mitchell,

This is an official notice regarding your fiduciary duties as a public officer with NSW Department of Communities and Justice in NSW.

As a member of the Living Council, I am writing to remind you of your constitutional obligations and fiduciary duties to the people of Australia.

Your immediate attention and response to this matter is required within 14 days of receipt of this notice.

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice and provide written confirmation of your understanding of these obligations.

Regards,
Living Council Member

Date: 2024-01-25
organization: NSW Department of Communities and Justice

subject: Reminder: Constitutional Oath Obligations - Michael Chen
body:
Dear Michael Chen,

I am writing to remind you of your constitutional oath obligations as a public servant with Victorian Department of Health.

As outlined in the Australian Constitution, all public officers are bound by their oath of office to serve the people of Australia faithfully and diligently.

This notice serves as a formal reminder of these obligations and your duty to uphold the Constitution and laws of Australia.

Your position: Melbourne Central Office
Branch: Health Services
Badge Number: VIC-045

Please confirm your understanding and continued commitment to these obligations.

Sincerely,
Living Council Member

Date: 2024-01-26

subject: Notice of Accountability Requirements - Queensland Department of Education
body:
To: Rebecca Thompson
Position: Brisbane District Office
Organization: Queensland Department of Education
State: QLD

Dear Rebecca Thompson,

This notice is served to inform you of your accountability requirements as a public officer.

All public servants are accountable to the people of Australia and must conduct themselves with integrity, honesty, and transparency.

You are required to:
1. Act in the public interest at all times
2. Maintain proper records of your decisions and actions
3. Respond to legitimate inquiries from the public
4. Uphold the highest standards of ethical conduct

Failure to comply with these requirements may result in further action.

This notice is issued under the authority of the Living Council.

Respectfully,
Living Council Member

Date: 2024-01-27

subject: Transparency and Disclosure Requirements - David Wilson
body:
Dear David Wilson,

This notice concerns transparency and disclosure requirements for public officers.

As a public servant with Western Australian Department of Environment in WA, you are required to maintain transparency in your official duties and disclose any conflicts of interest.

Key requirements include:
- Proper documentation of decisions
- Timely response to freedom of information requests
- Declaration of any potential conflicts of interest
- Adherence to ethical guidelines

Your cooperation in maintaining these standards is essential for public trust.

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice within 7 days.

Best regards,
Living Council Member

Issued: 2024-01-28

subject: Official Notice: Fiduciary Duty Compliance for Emma Rodriguez
body:
